<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" ><tr><td valign="top" style="font: inherit;"><DIV>Agai, despite his efforts to shield hmsef fromthe cative spark,it eitted more pulses, detected and felt by his own.  WHat was the meaning behind it?  Were they in some way related, did their sparks resonate on similar frequencies?  WHatever the reason, it was both interesting and annoying and he did not need distractions.  He did not know how to communicateto it, but he hoped it felt some assurance in his new urgency.</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>Leveling out and speeding p on course to the fortress, Megatron scanned its tough exterior.  it was sinking into the suppose safety of the lava, but it would be of no avail.  He targeted a saller supply storage access hatch well above the lava line.  It was big enough he ould fit through.  He cackled and powered his beam rifle, the barrels glowing bright and as they fired, the craft they were attached to shook horrendously for a moent.  Since the fortress was heat shielded, it'd take a fewmomentsto blow open or melt through the hatch.  He could wat just long enough for that.<BR><BR>--- On <B>Fri, 11/7/08, Lady Barbossa <I><MaximaSR74@...></I></B> wrote:<BR></DIV>
<BLOCKQUOTE style="PADDING-LEFT: 5px; MARGIN-LEFT: 5px; BORDER-LEFT: rgb(16,16,255) 2px solid">From: Lady Barbossa <MaximaSR74@...><BR>Subject: Re: A Spark of Hope<BR>To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com<BR>Date: Friday, November 7, 2008, 3:46 PM<BR><BR>

This is the new <BR>home<BR>> of Hydras and his particular brand of Predacons. <BR>> <BR>> However rather than the opposition that Megatron had prepared for,<BR>> there is nothing, save for expanse of the molten lake and the black<BR>> fortress itself!<BR>> <BR>> The fortress is positioned in the middle the large pool of lava,
 the<BR>> base itself covered in recent battle scars. Despite this the <BR>fortress<BR>> is somehow in the midst of submerging itself beneath the molten <BR>liquid<BR>> surface of the lava lake!<BR>><BR><BR>The spark safely hidden within pulsed softly three times very slowly. <BR>Almost as if wishing to add or help in any manner to whatever <BR>Megatron was doing. Either that or it was reacting. <BR>There was no explaination to the pulses. <BR><BR></DIV></DIV></DIV></BLOCKQUOTE></td></tr></table><br>
